queries.query: creature that embodies fire and can move through narrow spaces
queries.variant: creature that embodies flames and moves through tiny spaces

queries.query: large monster that ignites everything it touches and is weak to water
queries.variant: big monster that sets fire to everything it touches and is vulnerable to water

queries.query: intelligent elemental that creates fire damage around it and can dash through foes
queries.variant: smart elemental that causes fire damage near it and can sprint through enemies

queries.query: fire creature with a high speed and ability to generate area damage
queries.variant: flame creature with a fast movement and capability to create area attack

queries.query: elemental that thrives in fire and suffers damage in water
queries.variant: elemental that lives in flames and takes damage in water
